title: Modern Clubhouse with Chef's Kitchen, Package Receiving + Lockers
map_address: 3481 S Fenton St near W Hampden Ave
posting_body: Take a dip in our refreshing pool or heated outdoor spa, work out in our fitness center, or hang out with family, play cornhole and grill at our outdoor community lounge.
Our remodeled clubhouse features package lockers, a fully functioning chef’s kitchen, and a business center with free WiFi and printing that make working from home a breeze.
Even your four-legged friends will enjoy living at the Velo with a fenced-in dog park, immaculate indoor dog wash and direct access to Bear Creek Trails.
We’re confident our one and two bedroom pet friendly apartments are the perfect fit for you and your family.
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 947 Sq.
- Vaulted Ceilings with Skylights (top floor units)
- New shaker style cabinetry with chrome hardware
- Private Patio or Balcony with Views
- Immediate access to Bear Creek Walking and Bike Trails
- Remodeled business center with IMacs, Free wifi, and Printing
We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!
We allow two pets per apartment home with a combined weight not exceed 160 lbs.
Cats and dogs are welcome at our community although some breed restrictions apply.
